description.english: Beat Musical Memory without making any errors
Beat Whack-A-Wuggy without using the flashlight
Complete the Water Treatment puzzle in the least possible moves
Complete the full game in under 45 minutes
Pick up the Green Hand trophy
Pick up the Bunzo Bunny trophy
Pick up the Kissy Missy trophy
Pick up the PJ Pug-A-Pillar trophy
Pick up the Barry Cart trophy
Pick up the Mommy Long Legs trophy
Listen to all of Bron’s jokes
Go out in a blaze of glory
Escape the first dream without taking a wrong turn
Remove Bobby BearHug's battery without being noticed
Defeat Miss Delight in under two minutes
Defeat CatNap without using extra batteries
Listen to all of the Smiling Critter cardboard cutouts
Reach the Safe Room without launching your GrabPack hands more than 200 times
Collect all notes in the school
Get crushed in the trash compactor
Listen to a secret song with CatNap
Stay in the air for 30 seconds using the Purple Hand
Find Kissy Missy in Home Sweet Home
Ride a race car in Home Sweet Home
Shoot yourself with a Grab Turret five times
Shoot a flare at every Smiling Critter variant
Run with CatNap for one minute
Obtain the Omni-Hand from the Doctor
Survive the Horde without taking damage
Defeat Yarnaby without using any hiding spots
Complete the gas maze puzzle without any oxygen tank refills
Reroute the gas in the Foundation in the least possible moves
Defeat Doey without wasting any nitrogen canisters
Complete the game without launching your GrabPack hands more than 200 times
Fun until the day that you die!
Please do not pet the Yarnaby
Score three goals on an active CraftyCorn
Pay tribute to the fallen toys
Listen in on a private conversation
